name: Dictionary of Gnosis & Western Esotericism Online
description: The Dictionary of Gnosis & Western Esotericism Online is the comprehensive reference work to cover the entire domain of Gnosis and Western Esotericism from the period of Late Antiquity to the present. Containing 400 articles by many international specialists, this source provides critical overviews on the nature and historical development of Gnosticism, Hermetism, Astrology, Alchemy, and Magic. It includes articles on the Hermetic Tradition of the Renaissance and more.
